# ethemu

Ethemu is an Ethereum bytecode emulator implemented in python3 based on `octopus`.

You can get the instruction execution flow and print the stack/memory/storage info.

## Ussage

```py
import binascii
from ethemu import EthereumEmulatorEngine
from vmstate import EthereumVMstate

bytecode = binascii.unhexlify('')
callcode = binascii.unhexlify('c6c58bcd95529edd28cb526ab5071fd2fdebd5fc4e08b2af6876dd33a57764a970157576')

state = EthereumVMstate()
state.storage = {1: 0}
evm = EthereumEmulatorEngine(bytecode=bytecode, callcode=callcode)
evm.emulate()
```

## Reference

https://github.com/quoscient/octopus

https://solidity.readthedocs.io/en/v0.4.24/assembly.html
